plot outline: When a young woman from an upper caste family falls in love with a boy from a lower-caste background, violent objections erupt from her family members, who are willing to go to any lengths to tear the couple apart. How will their futures unfold?
title: Aarambha
plot: When a young woman from an upper caste family falls in love with a boy from a lower-caste background, violent objections erupt from her family members, who are willing to go to any lengths to tear the couple apart. How will their futures unfold?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
